name: gather
slogan: Gather uses data to get toilets to people who need them
description: We work with sanitation providers to transform how they use data. Our Centre for Sanitation Analytics is building a sanitation data platform, providing critical insight into where sanitation is most needed in emerging cities. We are also working on the world's first data standard for urban sanitation.

jobs.title: Programmes officer
jobs.description:
•	Working with our data analyst and using your GIS skills to help build up our sanitation data analytics capacity
•	Research and producing reports into cutting edge GIS and sanitation data projects
•	Supporting our programmes director and hub manager to run our data transformation project in Madagascar (you won’t be required to travel overseas)
•	Working as part of the secretariat for the Sanitation Data Commission and supporting their mission to create and launch a new urban sanitation data standard
•	Producing blog posts and articles on our work 
•	Providing ad hoc administrative support (max 1 day per week)
We’re a small organisation and love that all of our team get stuck into whatever needs doing most, so your role will be varied. We believe in professional development at Gather, so if there are other areas of our work you want to get experience in, tell us and we’ll try to make it happen.
